## CustomTipsConfiguration class

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Used to access the `common/config/rush/custom-tips.json` config file, which allows repo maintainers to configure extra details to be printed alongside certain Rush messages.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CustomTipsConfiguration 
```
